name: leb
description: Interactive dialectal-feature map for Lebanese Arabic

scripts.prep: SETLOCAL && FOR /F "tokens=* USEBACKQ" %g IN (`git lastmsg`) do (set "COMMITMSG=%g") && git reset HEAD~1 && npm run build && git add docs/ && CALL git commit -am "%COMMITMSG%" && ENDLOCAL

author: Hadi Tarhini
